results.title: Frequently asked questions
results.description: Clarity plays nicely with many popular website tools, including WordPress, Shopify, Woo Commerce, Google Tag Manager, Wix, and more. My Shopify ... Make sure to update your Shopify installation after major design changes. If your Shopify site updates its design (like switches to a new template), confirm that your Clarity script is still correctly.

results.title: Getting started with the connector for Shopify - Business Central
results.description: Get started with the Shopify Connector Connect your Shopify stores with Business Central and maximize your business productivity. Manage an... To use Shopify with Business Central, you must do a couple of things first. This article serves as a guide to integrate your Shopify store with Business Central. Prerequisites for Shopify You must have: A.
